website_summaries.verdict: A zippered leather wallet like this not only keeps cards and cash from spilling out, it also provides additional space for receipts and other papers. Ideal for carrying in a secured jacket pocket.
pros: Leather casing is stylish and durable
cons: Pockets are not uniform in depth
Does not fit well in back or front pockets

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I was leery of buying this, given some of the previous reviews. I have had it for a number of months, and it has performed well. The zipper is still intact, and I'm not overly-careful about what I put in it. I carry 12 cards, plus various other, thinner cards [gift cards, license, etc.], and bills. I've not had any issues with it, and I wouldn't hesitate to buy another. UPDATE: After nearly two years of everyday use, I have to say that this wallet has held up well. The zipper still works, and the wallet still looks good overall, if a bit worn. I still think this is a very good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Beth S.

customer_reviews.title: I love  this wallet! Owned for over a year and still looks new
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over for a wallet with a zipper in the local department stores and they just don't sell them. Once you have a zippered wallet you wont go back to the old style. I keep a lot of cards in my wallet and the zipper keeps everything nice and secure without having to worry about anything falling out. Had this wallet for over a year and it still looks new. Honestly no wear at all and the zipper still works perfect. It has plenty of space for credit cards, license etc. I have about 16 cards in it and they fit great.
customer_reviews.author: John S.

customer_reviews.title: This wallet is sort of big and we were going ...
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is sort of big and we were going to return it because my son thought it was too big and too old man-ish (He's 12). I bought it because he always has a lot of coin and wants a wallet with a coin section, but I haven't been able to find any that aren't made with velcro. He has since changed his mind and decided to keep it. Well made, leather wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie R.

customer_reviews.title: Second purchase. Again zipper failed. Customer service AWOL
customer_reviews.text: Purchased a second copy of this wallet after the zipper failed on the first one. After 18 months, this one too failed. Not the leather, not the stitching, but the actual zipper teeth at the very start of the zipper. This time I reached out to customer service asking what their warranty is. I did not receive a reply. No more Alpine Swiss for me... Updated - still no reply from customer service email or via Amazon...
customer_reviews.author: Someone2

customer_reviews.title: A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I loved this wallet. Very durable, functional, well made, kept my credit cards, cash, and other important documents safe. I carried it constantly, from my outdoors yardwork to my inside job. I owned it for about 1 1/2 years when the zipper started to malfunction. So, I replaced it with a wallet that had a metal zipper from a different vendor.
customer_reviews.author: TonyII

customer_reviews.title: Pulling apart after 4 days.
customer_reviews.text: Wallet is bigger than I expected. I used this wallet for one weekend and let me tell you I used it a lot. Cash in and out all weekend long. The wallet is already broken in. 2 stars because the threads are already letting loose on it. After having the wallet 4 days.Kinda bummed after seeing all the other positive reviews. Nice functioning wallet otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Riddlin

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully made leather wallets
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy in every way with these beautifully made leather wallets. I got them to give as gifts and they come wrapped up very nicely with a card that tells the story about the company, in lovely gift boxes . I am sure the recipients will be delighted. As a matter of fact, I am going to order more of these wallets in time for the Christmas holidays.
customer_reviews.author: garlic heart

customer_reviews.title: Travel or use your cards a lot??
customer_reviews.text: This is a great wallet to have. I know that my money is nice and safe and that includes my cards. I do not have to worry about someone coming by and getting my information on my cards. If you need something then this is the brand for you. It is nice to know that it is up to date with the lastest stuff to proctor your information from getting stolen. You will need this if you car going on trips and stuff....
customer_reviews.author: imolinar

customer_reviews.title: Credit card holders are too tight. Can fit just ...
customer_reviews.text: Credit card holders are too tight. Can fit just one card snugly. Two or more in each slot is tight. Not made for many cards or plastic savers cards. To open wallet zipper is at bottom and pull up. If zipper is on top and you pull down to open, all contents, coins and loose objects will fall down. Product is not as product in picture unless zipper is in the open position. I have to pull up to open and not pull down. Spend your money on another product. Has the Swiss name but not the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent wallet that holds everything I want. Still going strong after 3 years of hard use
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent wallet. It holds everything I want (I overstuff it a little) and after 3 years of hard use it's still in good shape - no broken stitching, the zipper works as good as new, and none of the internal parts are failing. There was a break-in period in the beginning as the leather is a little stiff but that phase passed quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Dickerson

customer_reviews.title: I like that it has 9 CC slots
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd wallet; previously ordered the same one on 06/2014. I like that it has 9 CC slots, an ID flap that is attached (where I don't have to physically take my ID out to show someone), 2 slots for money bills, and a zipper for extra protection (so nothing slips out). The quality is great; made out of leather. My old one is still good; although a couple of the CC slots were getting a little worn out; the ones I use daily. Aside from the usualy VISA, AMEX cards, I also use it for restaurant/supermarket GCs and membership/store loyalty cards. I highly recommend this wallet if you have similar card usage like me. :)
customer_reviews.author: Rranger

customer_reviews.title: this is a fine men's wallet
customer_reviews.text: As other reviewers have commented, this is a fine men's wallet. My cards kept sliding out of my older wallet, so I decided to try a zipper one. I was skeptical that I would like it, but I do. The zipper itself is supple and works very smoothly. If I had one thing to change I'd consider making the zipper-pull smaller or maybe flexible (made from leather), since this goes in my butt pocket. I've decided to load the pocket with the zipper-pull facing up, and I don't notice it. The design inside this wallet is perfect for me too.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, will check how long it last...
customer_reviews.text: Finally I found a wallet the size I needed!!! I love Swiss products and my old wallet was a fabric one but next time I try to get it I found out the made it bigger, something very disappointing this in the other hand is a nice surprise I try not to buy leather products but this one is great, the space for the card is the right size I can even place 2 o 3 cards in one slot and still doesn't feel bulky.
customer_reviews.author: MaJo Reliz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Details
customer_reviews.text: This wallet is well designed and beautifully made, the leather is soft yet resistant, the seams are perfectly stitched and beyond that they surprise you with details that go beyond the expectation of a good wallet such as the enamel logo on the zipper. Mine has a little enamel outside the logo, the only reason I could find to differentiate this wallet from a really high end one. I have purchased other Alpine Swiss wallets in the past, and after each purchase I become even more of a fan of the brand. The price point at which these wallets are offered is just the icing of the cake. Anyone who enjoys good craftmanship will be delighted with this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: agranados777

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I needed a new wallet. I love the fact that you zip it closed so nothing can fall out. I personally have put this tough a$$ wallet through everything you can imagine. I have had it for two years and love it. My own opinion, I will never get another wallet unless it's the same one.
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey  joworski

customer_reviews.title: Zip-a-de-do-dah! Zip-a-dee-day! By dis wallet today!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. What prompted me to buy it was a couple of recent episodes with my old similar wallet that had no zipper. Once I had credit cards fall on the floor at the register. Another time, all the stuff crammed into the pocket behind the credit cards slot fell out. In addition to zipping up, the slots in this wallet hold my credit cards a bit more snuggly when the wallet is open. This thing has a very substantial zipper which looks like it will last. Remarkable quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Moreno

customer_reviews.title: Good option if you have lots of credit/gift cards.
customer_reviews.text: It does have a distinct smell at first. Get over it, the smell goes away. So far this has been a good upgrade from the non zippered version. I feel more confident about not losing cards, and it holds more cards. I have started buying gift cards with big discounts, and I need more slots to hold them all. Zipper works great, no issues so far. It probably isn't buy it for life wallet, but these days I plan on using a wallet about 3 years or so. It's big but fits in my jean pockets just fine. Wish it had a change pocket as well, but most wallets don't have this anyways.
customer_reviews.author: 2Fast4U

customer_reviews.title: It has that beautiful, new leather smell - so it passes the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have just received this wallet, and my first impressions, at least, are that this wallet is extremely well made, and classy-looking. It has that beautiful, new leather smell - so it passes the "sniff test!" It has a beautiful texture, with that strong feel, yet soft, and yielding. I have completely filled it up with my D/L, various cards, photos and some bills. I especially chose it for the zipper, and was impressed by the volume of positive feedback & feedback score. It measures: W: 4.75" (12cm); H: 3.75: (9.50cm); The thickness of my wallet is an incredible 1.25" (33mm).
customer_reviews.author: Luigi Long

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love the zipper feature. My husband needs his wallets with a zipper as he works in construction and it helps keep out the dirt. Just wish the ID slot was on the right or left, not in the middle section as that sections seems to be the one that wears out first, then he would just have to put his ID in one of the credit card slots and it would not be easily visible.
customer_reviews.author: Ladyjr4

customer_reviews.title: Me Likey
customer_reviews.text: Pretty cool. A tad big but that's because of the room for a zipper. However the size and the double bill-fold section means it can safely hold a lot of moolah safely, and keep the greenbacks apart from your foreign banknotes. I got this for a trip. I think the zipper is good for dropping wallet through security points at airports and for general feeling of security when coming and going. May need smaller wallet for going out at night. Leave this one in the hotel safe. Let's see ... Will report back...
customer_reviews.author: Big Apple

customer_reviews.title: Nice Wallett!
customer_reviews.text: I tried out this wallet at the same time I tried out the Alpine Swiss Leather Credit Card Wallet Pocket Secretary. I chose the latter one because of the added space. However, everything fit into this one just fine and I'm sure I would have liked this one as well. Only things that caused me not to keep this one was, first, I was concerned that the zipper would break over time... and second, I might run out of room in the wallet. It was a VERY close, difficult decision for me to make. I recommend this wallet to those looking for one of this type.
customer_reviews.author: Captain ET

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with it. We're on rural land on "sugar sand" and it gets into everything when I work outside, ruining cellphones, credit cards, and collecting in my pockets and wallet. It's a little big because of the zipper and initially felt almost as thick as my trifold wallet. However, it has fitted itself to my posterior perfectly over time and everything in it is in good condition with no sand inside. Organization is very good. Pretty much good as new after 4 months.
customer_reviews.author: burndoubt

customer_reviews.title: More Card Slots than a Normal Zip Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a Christmas gift for my husband. He likes his wallets to zip, so I knew he would love this. It's leather, which smells great, and the bifold in this wallet is a Godsend because his old wallet didn't have enough slots for his cards. This was a perfect gift for him.
customer_reviews.author: Eileen

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: This wallet lasted my husband many years of daily wear even on construction sites. It kept his cards straight & protected, never bent.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Rexford

customer_reviews.title: So far I really like it. I Have only had it for a ...
customer_reviews.text: So far I really like it. I Have only had it for a week. If it holds up I would definitely recommend it. Plenty of room inside and keeps your stuff secure and clean from pocket lint. I originally purchased it to protect my credit cards from getting ruined due to dirt and grinding dust from my job. So far it is clean as a whistle inside. Great price too. The only thing I don't like is the large chrome zipper tab. For me, it is a little too much. Would like if the tab would have been about a quarter of the length. Other than that great so far.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Me

customer_reviews.title: Durable, well- constructed.
customer_reviews.text: Here's the high point of this wallet: it is durable. I go through wallets like crazy and this one has stuck with me for about 8 months now. It is well-crafted and take abuse pretty well. The other feature that I love about this wallet is the zipper. It zips the wallet to keep anything from falling out. I didn't think this would be an important feature, but after having it for a while it give me a lot more confidence in the wallet. I would (will?) buy this wallet again and highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Pete O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: I decided to try this brand of wallet because others I have the zippers have split very easily on them, so far so good with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Troy Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Good wallet - one big flaw
customer_reviews.text: I got this wallet last week. It is real leather, appears to be well-made and is very spacious for how small it is. The flaw with this wallet, in my opinion, is that the zipper opens to the top so that when the wallet is open the zipper is occluding the bills pocket. The zipper also doesn't quite open completely without finagling it so the wallet, especially the top of the wallet, doesn't completely open without finagling. If Alpine Swiss would just turn the zipper around I think it would be about perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Crash

customer_reviews.title: Nice - smooth - sleek
customer_reviews.text: When I opened the packaging, the wallet smelled of new leather...it still does after a few days of use. But the leather feels nice and smooth, the external zip sturdy and opens/closes cleanly. The car-slots inside seem adequate, tho' sometimes a snug fit for standard cards! There are two billold pockets; would have appreciated an inner zippered space...but...I generally like this wallet - it is slim enough after my stuff in it, has a smooth feel to it and was not too "heavy on the wallet also"...hehe...But above all, it makes me feel assured that my cards etc will not spill out if I remove it from my pocket in a hurry or something.
customer_reviews.author: Umang Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Third time purchasing.
customer_reviews.text: While the zipper may not withstand the test of time, the rest of the wallet is nice and durable. The wallet itself was finally starting to wear out and there just wasn't anything else I needed, so once again I'm getting this one and don't have to worry about re-learning the organization. HEADLINE: "poor zipper died" The red part of the logo fell off about 3 months in. Beyond that, it's been great. Just kinda sad that the zipper only lasted 16 months. The wallet has plenty of use left, but I picked it for the zipper feature.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Martin

customer_reviews.title: One of the best zipper wallets you can find!
customer_reviews.text: Zipper wallets are hard to find. This one is made of soft leather and the biggest thing that really stands out is that its easy to open and close with the quality zipper. Can't say that about most zipper wallets I've had. The zipper is not down between the fold of the wallet, making it easier to zip open and closed. Others I'd have to zip open to the most allowable distance then force the wallet open all the way to get out bills, etc. This would often break the zippers after some time. Way to go Alpine Swiss! You've got a winner here that you need to keep making for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bean

customer_reviews.title: Satisified Customer
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my husband; he works in the field of concrete cutting, because the magnetic strips on the back of his credit cards would become unreadable/usuable when swiping for any payments; from concrete dust, sand, dirt, etc., getting in his wallet while he's working. He said he really likes it & so far, so good. Would definitely recommend this item to others; especially to anyone who is in the same field of work.
customer_reviews.author: VFerris

customer_reviews.title: great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Very nice wallet. Plenty of slots for credit cards and the like, however, business card don't fit. Has two slots for paper money. Zipper was a little tight going around the circumference at first but has broken in nicely and closes easily. I just hope that the zipper is long lived. The wallet is not too big and not to small, if one is careful not to overfill this wallet it is just as home in the front pocket as it is in the back. Overall I really like this wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Renee B. Heal

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: I don't care about looking like an old buzzard, this keeps things from falling out of my wallet. Others have commented that they have not seen a wallet like this one in a long time but I don't care. It works very well.
customer_reviews.author: inland sailor

customer_reviews.title: they worked fine for me and i was able to get everything ...
customer_reviews.text: seems to work ok after having used it for a month...i'll give it 4 stars while reserving the right to upgrade to 5 if the seemingly flimsy zipper holds up...i didn't have the problems reported by others vis a vis the credit card slots being too tight...they worked fine for me and i was able to get everything i needed from my old wallet into a lot less space...part of it was the wallet--part of it was my wife deciding what i actually NEEDED to carry...thanks, dear...fwho knew that condoms had an expiration date??...
customer_reviews.author: Ben Dover

customer_reviews.title: Save your money!
customer_reviews.text: Smells horrible! Probably from the glue used during construction. The credit card slots are too small. Looks cheaply made. I would expect better on something with the Swiss logo. I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: A good zipper wallet for anyone in the market!
customer_reviews.text: I like this wallet a lot! I had problems with my other wallets stretching out which led to my credit/debit cards falling out easily. I decided it was time to buy a zipper wallet and this one has worked flawlessly and the zipper is holding up very well. Will update in the future if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gift for my dad
customer_reviews.text: he has had this wallet for a few months ago and it has held up. he had a zippered wallet that was OLD and prior to me purchasing it he was telling me he had tried to find one in the stores...either they didnt have them OR they did and they were an extreme difference in price versus regular wallets....because he uses his debit car and keeps the receipts this why he likes the zippered wallet--he can put the receipts in, zipper it, and dont have to worry with losing the receipts. he is self employed and keeping receipts is of the essence for him--PERFECTO!! and much cheaper than what local stores wanted for their price!!
customer_reviews.author: tina d

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Nicest wallet I’ve owned. I had a slight reservation about ordering it because I have never had a zippered wallet, but it very good quality for the price and it holds the contents securely. Does not take up much more room than a standard wallet and fits in the back pocket fine as well as dress slacks front and jacket pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: i bought 4 of these for the men in my life. I can only speak for my BFs experience. It's difficult to find a nice quality wallet, men's or women's, I think. This wallet fits nicely in the pocket of his jeans or in the pocket of his suit without adding bulk. Appreciate the added outside zipper for security of the inside contents. Inside features enough card slots to hold all the cards he has. We've had this a couple of years now and it's hold up very well, even after daily use.
customer_reviews.author: ProviderKat

customer_reviews.title: Zippered wallet keeps everything where I put it!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice wallet. The leather has that "soft buttery" feel and I really like the zipper feature that seals the whole thing. I keep small things like keys in my wallet--they don't escape now. One time I had to remove my ring for a medical test--popped it right into this wallet and I knew it would be safe, no fear of it slipping from a pocket or being left behind. It is holding up well and stretches a bit to hold more than one would imagine. Solid purchase, glad I got it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the US
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a while now. Primarily, I ordered it because of the travel outside US, wanted something secure with zipper. It worked fine in the US but when used during UK/Europe travel, it did not work that well as the GBP and Euros bills are larger than USD which did not fit in this wallet and I ended up damaging some bills. Again good product for someone using in the US but for other countries where bills are larger than USD, get something with more depth.
customer_reviews.author: FS

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet if you loose stuff
customer_reviews.text: I keep my credit cards, money, ID and other stuff in my wallet. I notice that when I had my regular wallet upside down credit cards would fall out. One day I didn't notice I drop a credit card and a gentleman found my credit card on the ground and was honest enough to return it to me. I said to myself I need a wallet with a zipper around it to hold my stuff inside. This wallet is perfect for that. You want need to ever worry about losing a credit card or ID. Plus it has all the normal function and slots of a credit card wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Abstract Cool Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Not just for men!
customer_reviews.text: I hate carrying a purse around because it falls off the shoulder when you bend over to look at something on the shelf at a store or when putting in or out of a buggy. I loved my husband's wallet so much that I decided I wanted one too and chose this one. Very soft to the touch. Doesn't look like it's just for men. Had enough card spots for my needs. Could use more if you have a bunch of cards. Has 2 bills compartments. Looks like it anyway. I like that I can put my idea in a plastic covered slot.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great choice.....
customer_reviews.text: lets see, everyone is telling about the product quality, well is there you will not have a problem w/ it. you have to pay attention to the date of some reviews some are saying this item is CRAP but most of them are old. I dont know if they change the product quality and size on the wallet but I can tell you this you will not find a better bargain and top noch quality for the money you pay than this deal it is awesome. shipping is great as well i received my order just a couple of days I place my orde and i order 3 different wallets and im still waiting for the other 2.
customer_reviews.author: angel

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son 3 yrs ago. He loves it. It is very well made and is still going strong. I would buy this again
customer_reviews.author: D. Mageary

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Some people think you're paranoid for buying a wallet with zipper. Maybe they never had all contents spill out in line at the ATM. This wallet keeps everything nice and safe and has plenty of room for credit cards. The money sits down nice and low inside the billfold area. I thought the zipper might be a pain in the neck but it works great and doesn't snag.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Verry happy with this wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet. I Like the zip feature. I noticed a few reviews said the zipper broke so I have tried not to be too rough on mine. I have no issues yet. The wallet has plenty of slots for cards. I also noticed some reviews said that the card slots were too tight. I noticed this at first but they have loosened with use. I do not want them falling out of their slots. It did have a strong odor when I first got it but that has dissipated. It is not too thick.
customer_reviews.author: co517

customer_reviews.title: Awesome wallet!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was really picky when choosing this wallet, I looked at so many different types. What I really wanted was the security of the zipper. It's a perfect size, I didn't want to feel like I was carrying my wife's wallet in my back pocket! It fits perfectly in my back pocket of my jeans, shorts. It's like a normal size of all my previous wallets but with the added security of the zipper so nothing falls out! If I ever need to replace this wallet, I am definitely buying the same one again!!
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Zippered
customer_reviews.text: I needed a wallet that could be zippered shut. This one works great. I don't worry about pulling my old trifold wallet out of my pocket only to have it drop credit cards etc.. This is a good size wallet and holds everything.
customer_reviews.author: Bruceman

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality! Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product. Easy to take the credit cards from the pockets, keeps everything very organized! The zipper has good quality as well and closes the wallet perfectly. I had tried other models without zipper or with a pressure button but when you put all the credit cards plus cash you just can't close it. This one is perfect. Also fits very well on my pocket. I would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandre

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather zip closure wallet
customer_reviews.text: Bought this Alpine Men's leather zip wallet for my husband for Christmas. He loves it, he's in roofing & all things construction. I bought a second one for when he wears this one out. Love the RFID feature as well.
customer_reviews.author: EL

customer_reviews.title: Girlfriend's dad
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend's dad really likes these wallets. He had been using this same brand and style for years.
customer_reviews.author: Ohcan23

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet this is my 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd Alpine Swiss zipper wallet , my old one lasted about 3 or 4 years don't remember exactly when I bought it , but the zipper broke loose from teeth, the wallet itself still look good for age. It can hold about 18 cards
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and room for everything you can think of!
customer_reviews.text: Needed something that would fit all of my cards and then some. This Alpine Swiss Zippered Bifold mens wallet did the trick. It has 9 credit card slots with a middle ID holder. There are also two separated bill compartments. The zipper is great as well to ensure nothing falls out, however i can see it being a problem if your a guy whose wallet looks like a phone book. Besides that, 1 year in and still going strong! thinking about buying another one to have on hand just in case they stop making them!
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Great deal for leather zip around wallet
customer_reviews.text: The wallet looks very nice, feels nice even for a men's wallet which I got for my husband. Fits all the cards he needs. Lots of card slots. Also has 2 long sections for the bills and receipts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Uyehara

customer_reviews.title: Zipper
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. It carries a lot of cards with ability to zip and not bulge your pocket. Zipper doesn’t bother you either
customer_reviews.author: Wheatieo

customer_reviews.title: 9 instead of 12 slots for cards
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this three stars because it only has 9 slots for cards, rather than 12 as stated in the description. Without having plastic inserts, there just isn't enough room in the billfold for all my cards to display all the cards. There is enough room for the cards to fit since the width is large enough, and I can put several cards in the same slot. The billfold seems to be well made. If there were 12 slots as advertised, I would give it a 4-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: P Willis

customer_reviews.title: Slim Zippered Wallet
customer_reviews.text: My husband wanted to get an updated wallet for our 17 year old. They wanted one with a zipper. This is what we found that fit what they both were looking for. Our 17 year old has commented several times how he loves the wallet! So far it is holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet, great price!
customer_reviews.text: Husband LOVES this wallet. He said, "if I were to design a wallet, this is exactly how I would design it." There are plenty spaces for all of his cards. The zipper gives him added security as he had a card slip out of his wallet once.
customer_reviews.author: Nutmeg

customer_reviews.title: I'm keeping it but it's not ideal.
customer_reviews.text: There is no change compartment, for that reason I gave it 3 stars instead of 4. It's not bad looking, the leather is soft and looks good. It's a bit larger than I like and it is bulky if you fill every card slot plus use the dollar bills compartment. I have 12 credit cards and carry about 6 bills and it makes the wallet about 1 inch thick. I cannot use it in dressy trousers but it's okay in my cargo pants knee pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Jayep

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: Love this wallet. Plenty of room for my cards and cash. Cards are held securely. Appears to be made of high quality material.
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Nice zippered wallet
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad for Christmas, he wanted a wallet that zipped all the way around because he had broken. After searching for what seemed like forever, I found this, it is well made and stylish. It has a flap for his ID and plenty of slots for his cards. However, once he filled the wallet, it was almost too full to zip up! Once he removed a few cards it was better. It's been a month of using it and it seems to be holding up well. He is really happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Erin D.

customer_reviews.title: Tight....
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this one, but at the end it happened just like with the other one I bought. To tight... I don't understand why then don't test this kind of things. You put the amount of cards it says it can hold, and jammed... that is it.... closing the zipper an adventure... and getting cards out? pleaseeeeeee... be patient.... as I said in another review... I end up buying one of those aluminum wallets... mine is a Sharkk Large something... I wanted a leather like kind... but nope... they themselves send me to buy something else...
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Great Wallet
customer_reviews.text: Nice wallet. It zips closed to keep your stuff safe and seems fairly durable. Plenty of space for business cards, cash and credit cards. The red around/behind the Swiss cross will fade and disappear, but otherwise it's stayed intact for over a year now. The zipper still works and no parts have torn or worn out. If I paid twice the price (price for me was about $10) it would still be worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and even better price
customer_reviews.text: My dad loves it! I got this for him for father's day because he's been hunting everywhere for a wallet with zippers. The only issue he had at first was that one of the card slips would get stuff in the zipper when you try to unzip the wallet. Once it's filled and thicker, perhaps that issue would go away. Nonetheless, thank you! Great product and even better price!
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: Wallet for a teen traveler
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this wallet after an extensive search and reading numerous reviews for my 15 year-old grandson. He was going on a field trip with his high school music class to New York. I wanted a wallet that had a zipper so that any money and other items would be secure. He really liked the set up of the wallet and it was his first grown up leather wallet. I feel the items he will be putting into the wallet will be less likely to fall out accidentally. We were both very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Excellent zip around wallet!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my hubby. He absolutely loved it! The zip around is such a great concept so that nothing will fall out of the wallet. The material is good quality and feels like it will last for quite a long time. His coworker seen his wallet and bought himself one as well. My hubby said he will stick to this zip around wallet and will never go back to the regular wallets.
customer_reviews.author: LRC

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his Alpine Swiss leather zip wallet. He says it has plenty of compartments for the things he needs to carry and the zipping feature of the wallet keeps his personal belongings and money from falling out. He has asked where I ordered the wallet from; he has a friend who would like to get one because of the zipper feature.
customer_reviews.author: Desert Rat

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and has held up well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband last Christmas because he was always dropping all this cards out of his old wallet. The one solved that problem. Plus it looks good and almost a year later still looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Angela French

customer_reviews.title: he immediately liked this. I thought it was a tad large ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a birthday gift for my dad, he is very picky and he ended up loving it. He usually hates the gifts we get him, he immediately liked this. I thought it was a tad large for a men's wallet, but hey im not the one using it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Alpine Swiss Zippered Bifold Men's Wallet
customer_reviews.text: I have used zippered men's wallets for years now but have never used Alpine Swiss until now. This is the best zippered bifold men's wallet I have found. It is made of real leather with a quality zipper. I was so impressed with the quality and price that I had to order another one. The price is outstanding. Its like when you find something really good you hope the manufacture never stops making them. This product is the best I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: You won't have to pull out too much money out of this wallet to by another...Great Product at a Great Price.
customer_reviews.text: I see that some complain that it smells like leather?????? My shoes are all leather...they smell like leather too...WTF! Real leather smells...you should expect it to. Nice compartments and credit cards fit perfectly. Zipper is nylon with what appears to be a nickel metal pull with the Alpine Cross on it. It's a wallet that you can really load up if you like, and at $12, a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Well-made wallet with zipper to keep stuff in the wallet.
customer_reviews.text: I almost didn't order this wallet because of complaints by reviews about the size of the credit card pockets. I found the pockets to be a tight fit, but the cards did fit. That's ok because I bought a new wallet to replace an aging wallet that cards would fall out of at times. I am very happy with this wallet and happy I took the risk to purchase it.
customer_reviews.author: Hamza Philip

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet-keeps credit cards clean & working!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this wallet for my husband because all of his credit cards get dirty fairly quickly in a regular wallet which causes them to wear out quickly and then they do not swipe. I was tired of constantly ordering him new cards so I thought this zipper wallet might help keep the dirt away. It is working fantastic. I am worried the zipper will eventually fail, but so far so good. My husband was a little hesitant to get the zipper wallet, but since it is working he likes it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Secure
customer_reviews.text: No longer do things fall out of my wallet while shopping. The zipper does the trick. A little larger than some wallets but worth the extra size for the security of not losing anything out of it while taking/putting it into pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Ok.
customer_reviews.text: You don't want to sit on this wallet. Put it in a side pocket; it's about half again the width of a generic triple-fold and can expand to perhaps twice the thickness; with a few items (including coins) in there, it's maybe half again the width. It will hold credit cards, other cards, and cash, and one or two of the pockets could be used to hold a small amount of coins. After a few days of use, it seems to hold together well.
customer_reviews.author: J. D.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Wallet My Husband Ever Had
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He always over stuff his wallet and ruins it quickly. But this one lasted over 2 years instead of his abuse. As he requested, I ordered it again to replace. I hope Amazon would carry this for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: atagany

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, I’m very hard on wallets due to my line of work. My first one lasted 3 years and was still in good shape except half the zipper came out of place.
customer_reviews.author: James R. Vile

customer_reviews.title: Good price and good materials.
customer_reviews.text: The lambskin is supple and the wallet has many pockets, which is useful. I like most of the wallet. Like it 95%. The biggest drawback I see, and I've only been using it for half a day is the large zipper pull. Just have a feeling it will be getting in the way. Feels thicker than my old wallet which has the exact same contents. Guess I'll really know after a car ride and how much of a impression it leaves on me. ;)
customer_reviews.author: The VIK

customer_reviews.title: great wallet. i buy a new one every year ...
customer_reviews.text: great wallet. i buy a new one every year as the zipper will eventually wear out and my spouse is hard on his wallet. love the zip feature and that everything stay nicely together. great product has proven the test of time with us.
customer_reviews.author: Hennie

customer_reviews.title: Has held up very well over the years
customer_reviews.text: Have been using it for a year or two and it is still holding up well with the zipper function allowing nothing to fall out
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This is my first zippered wallet and I like having it. It has plenty of room for my cards and bills and a place for my drivers licsence with window. The only reason I didn't give it a 5 star is the little metal zipper puller. I think they should have a little smaller leather type puller. The one on there looks nice but it can be felt sometimes when in my pocket. I would buy another without a doubt though.
customer_reviews.author: Jim M from Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly durable and functional leather wallet....
customer_reviews.text: I don't often write reviews but I recently bought a second wallet for my father who was impressed by the practicality, functionality, and durability of my wallet (I'm still impressed one year after purchase). Very fairly priced for a true leather wallet with a durable zipper. (I usually over fill the wallet with receipts) A. Luongo PA-C, MBA [...]
customer_reviews.author: PA-MBA1

customer_reviews.title: bad bad
customer_reviews.text: 5 days later it is broken, is not good quality
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars for quality
customer_reviews.text: Leather is great , great size, & enough space. My problem with this product was that it came damaged. The zipper was broken, the plastic bag it came in was ripped, & the zipper teeth weren't properly linked together. I returned it & didn't want to order another one for fear of getting another damaged one.
customer_reviews.author: Saints

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Use to worry about items falling out of my wallet, but this has fixed all that. Was concerned the zipper would eventually fail but have had it for about 4 months now and it still works great!
customer_reviews.author: Billie D. Coley

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet!
customer_reviews.text: My husband does landscaping and had to keep replacing his bank cards due to dirt damaging them when it got in his wallet. I know it's not a problem for everyone but thanks to this wallet it isn't one for us anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Danzukk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love it and a great price will buy again thank you
customer_reviews.author: Nick Sferrazza

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: Lots of room for money and credit cards. Zipper is a plus to keep your money inside the wallet. Overall a nice wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Herb

customer_reviews.title: this is a great wallet i have always had a zipped wallet and ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great wallet i have always had a zipped wallet and they are very safe. no money ever falls out of them. i had to buy a new one cause someone bought mine from me.they are the best wallets in the world. just my opinion of course. however where i go people are always asking me where did i get my wallet. they can't fine them in any of the stores. to bad so sad for them cause i am not selling mine again.
customer_reviews.author: m. murray

customer_reviews.title: Great wallet
customer_reviews.text: I really like this wallet - I wasn't sure if I'd like the zipper thing and it did take some getting used to and getting things more organized in the wallet - which gets very fat very quickly. Had to take some things out, but they weren't really necessary in their anyway. Leather is very soft, color is very black and lustrous. The price was incredible. I don't think I'll ever have a wallet that doesn't zip, ever again. I'm sold on Alpine Swiss as well.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: BEST WALLET EVER!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wallet ever! I used to get dirt in my old wallet and mess up my cards and pictures. Not with this Alpine Swiss. This thing is durable as all get out! I had it for quite a while now and it still even smells brand new! Excellent quality will buy one again if this one ever kicks the bucket. I don`t think that will happen for a long time. If it ever does happen!
customer_reviews.author: DaRcAgE

customer_reviews.title: Nice zipper wallet but a little bulky
customer_reviews.text: I prefer thin wallets but also wanted the security of a zipper wallet. This seemed the best choice. There are lots of places to hold your cards in addition to the nice center flip card case, so I cut the flip card case out using scissors, in order to make the wallet thinner. I also cut off two-thirds of the zipper pull so it would more easily fit in and out of my pants pockets. And now I have a relatively thin and nicely functional zipper wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Rodavan

customer_reviews.title: Well Made Wallet with Durable Zipper
customer_reviews.text: A very well made wallet that fits over 10 cards, my beard comb, ID, and cash with no issues. I purchased this wallet because I needed a new one, because my old wallet was really loose and my debit cards ended up falling out of it. So I knew I needed a zipper, and man, this wallet kills the game. Not to mention the price is great! Highly recommend this to anyone who needs a better wallet that has a zipping function.
customer_reviews.author: Kevy Kev

customer_reviews.title: Many a Card Slots
customer_reviews.text: I like zippered wallets, it gives me something to do while I calculate the amount of money I am about to spend, another failsafe way of ensuring I am confident in my purchase. Nonetheless, this wallet has a zipper! Also, it has many places for cards, like alot of card slots, there are many. The wallet is great and the leather is soft, and supple. The build quality is fantastic, it seems like it will zip longer then I will live. All in all 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Opened up this well packaged wallet real leather smells good
customer_reviews.text: tried some of the cheaper wallets.The zipper breaks after a few months Proabley me I carry 10 credit cards ID cash etc upon unwrapping wallet from gift pouch first thing I noticed was the well made zipper then saw the compartments that are well organized a solid wallet one of the tags inside suggested retail was 49.99 I paid 15.00 it is larger than a regular wallet so if you want something smaller don't buy this one look forward to many years of service
customer_reviews.author: Andre E. Foster

customer_reviews.title: I ordered another Alpine Swiss zipper wallet
customer_reviews.text: This is my husband's second Alpine wallet in 5 years. He is very rough on wallets and his cards and ID's got dirty with other wallets. After 5 years of use the zipper broke but it was expected, he had too much in it.
customer_reviews.author: Gttn Gd

customer_reviews.title: Nice wallet
customer_reviews.text: The leather feels great and the wallet looks nice. I have stuffed mine with 8 cards, some bills and my driver's license. I'm not very organized, so I usually put more than one card per compartiment, and they fit well. But the driver's license compartiment is a bit tight. I had to force it a bit to fit mine. One thing it doesn't have is a coin compartiment. In fact I don't like coins, so I don't care very much. All and all I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: damarques

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality wallet and not bulky
customer_reviews.text: Usually i never write reviews but this time i am really happy with this wallet and thought of putting a good review. The wallet quality is very good with nice outlook and zip. Now there is no need to worry about cards coming out of the wallet. The wallet gives a very good space for keeping few hundred dollars,more than 10 cards and still its not bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Vasu
